page.title: 06St Mary's Church, Halewood.
page.content: St Mary's church is the newest church in Halewood and it is Church of England and Methodist. The original church was built in 1967 but this was destroyed by fire. The present church was built in 1974. There are two Ministers, one for each denomination, plus a number of other helpers who help run the church in many different ways. As well as the usual religious services every Sunday there are many other activities that go on within the church buildings. These activities include scouts, guides, a playgroup, a dance group, a Bible study group and a blind persons club. The church has strong links with the other churches in Halewood and there are quite often joint services held in St Mary's.
